LayoutNode.Content: SHOPPING 21 New Arrivals From Nasty Gal That'll Soothe Your Shopaholic Soul Remember when you told yourself didn't need more clothes? Turns out that was only because these weren't available yet. Posted on May 17, 2018, 18:01 GMT Mallory Mower BuzzFeed Staff
LayoutNode.SRC:
Shopping

21 New Arrivals From Nasty Gal That'll Soothe Your Shopaholic Soul

Remember when you told yourself didn't need more clothes? Turns out that was only because these weren't available yet.

Posted on May 17, 2018, 18:01 GMT Mallory Mower
BuzzFeed Staff

LayoutNode.Content: We hope you love the products we recommend! Just so you know, BuzzFeed may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. Oh, and FYI — prices are accurate and items in stock as of time of publication.
LayoutNode.SRC: We hope you love the products we recommend! Just so you know, BuzzFeed may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. LayoutNode.Content: Psst! If you like anything you see below, you can get an *extra* 10% off at Nasty Gal if you use our exclusive promo code — BUZZ10 — at checkout! They're already having discounts of up to 80% off, so this deal? It's major.
LayoutNode.SRC: Psst! If you like anything you see below, you can get an *extra* 10% off at Nasty Gal if you use our exclusive promo code — BUZZ10 — at checkout! They're already having discounts of up to 80% off, so this deal? It's major.

LayoutNode.Content: 1. A top with a milkmaid sleeve and ruffled detail. Get ready to use your photoshop skills, because you'll want to ~crop~ A top everything else out of your photos just so this top gets the attention it deserves.
